net.rptools.maptool.model.Token.name: Lib:SpellLibrary
net.rptools.maptool.model.Token.gmNotes:
Update 1.2 (5/7/202)
- Add Configuration menu. Currently only used to specify when a token should receive a Spellbook macro - Fix clicking on the column name of a subtable sorting the spells - Fix spells with apostrophe in their name not working - Fix spells so upcasting to level 9 now possible - Fix slight error in upcasting damage calculation - Change upcasting spells to display the rolls for the base spell and upcasted bonus separately - Change Saving Throw / Checks / Attacks to display the spell DC if no target are selected - Change spell attacks to display the damage of a critical hit - Library now available on GitHub
Update 1.1 (5/4/2020)
- Fix Spell Library and Spellbook macro to execute immediately when clicked - Add a Spellbook macro to tokens when they learn their first spell - Add "Share" button in each spell description, which prints a link to the spell in the chat - Change upcasting links so that casters can choose the level they wish to cast a spell at - Fix saving throws and skill checks if the token is not properly configured for Melek's framework

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
<script>

	// Add event listener so active classe set to the current button (highlight it)
	let classContainer = document.getElementById('classContainer');
	addSelectorListeners(classContainer, 'selectorAll');

	classContainer = document.getElementById('sourceContainer');
	addSelectorListeners(classContainer, 'sourceAll');	

	classContainer = document.getElementById('levelContainer');
	addSelectorListeners(classContainer, 'levelAll');		

	function addSelectorListeners(container, idAll){
		let selectors = container.getElementsByClassName('selector');
		for (let i = 0; i < selectors.length; i++) {		
			selectors[i].addEventListener('click', function(){

 			if (this.id === idAll){
				let currents = container.getElementsByClassName('active');
				for (let h = currents.length-1; h >= 0; h--) {
					currents[h].className = currents[h].className.replace(' active', '');
				}
				this.className += ' active';
 			}  else {
				if(this.className.includes('active')){
					this.className = this.className.replace(' active', '');
					let currents = container.getElementsByClassName('active');
					if (currents.length == 0){
						let selectorAll = document.getElementById(idAll);
						selectorAll.className += ' active';
					}
				} else {
					this.className += ' active';
					let selectorAll = document.getElementById(idAll);
					selectorAll.className = selectorAll.className.replace(' active', '');
				}
 			}
 			filterSpells();
		});
	}
	}

	// Creates the spell library table
	function CreateTable(){
		try{

        let table = document.createElement('table');

        table.id = 'spellTable';

        let arrHead = new Array();
        
        arrHead = ['Level', 'Name', '', 'Cast Time', 'Duration', 'Save', 'Range', 'Source', ''];
        if (vCast){ arrHead.unshift('');}  // Preparation
		if (vIsToken){ arrHead.push('');} // Learn / Forget button

		// Column names
        let tr = table.insertRow(-1);
        for (let h = 0; h < arrHead.length; h++) {
            let th = document.createElement('th');
            th.className = 'spellHeader';
            th.textContent = arrHead[h];
            tr.appendChild(th);
        }

		// For each spell
        for (let c = 0; c < vLength; c++) {
			let vSpell = vListedSpells[c];
			let td;
        	
            tr = table.insertRow(-1);
            tr.id = vSpell.name;

            // Prepare

            if (vCast){
            	createTogglePrepButton(tr, vSpell);
            }

            // Classes list
            let classesArray = [];

			if (vSpell.classes &&  vSpell.classes.fromClassList){
				for (let ci = 0; ci < vSpell.classes.fromClassList.length; ci++){
					classesArray.push(vSpell.classes.fromClassList[ci].name);
				}
        	}
			if (vSpell.classes && vSpell.classes.fromSubclass){
				classesArray.push('Subclass');
			}
			if (vSpell.races){
				classesArray.push('Race');
			}
			tr.setAttribute('data-classes', classesArray.join(','));

			// Source
			tr.setAttribute('data-source', vSpell.source);

			// Levels
			tr.setAttribute('data-level', vSpell.level);
			
            td = tr.insertCell(-1);
			td.textContent = capitalize(GetStringSpellLevel(vSpell.level));
			td.style.textAlign = 'center';
			td.setAttribute('data-sort', vSpell.level);
			
            // Name
            td = tr.insertCell(-1);
			vName = vSpell.name;
            td.textContent = vName;

            // Tag
            let vTags = new Array();
            if (vSpell.duration[0].concentration){
				vTags.push('C');
            }
            if (vSpell.meta && vSpell.meta.ritual){
				vTags.push('R'); 
            }
            td = tr.insertCell(-1);
            td.textContent = vTags.join(',');

             // Casting time
			let vTime = vSpell.time[0];
            td = tr.insertCell(-1);
            td.textContent = vTime.number + ' ' + vTime.unit;
            td.style.textAlign = 'center';
            td.setAttribute('data-sort', vSpell.time[0].inMinutes);

            // Duration
    		let vDuration = vSpell.duration[0];
            td = tr.insertCell(-1);
            td.setAttribute('data-sort', vSpell.duration[0].inMinutes);
            

			if (vDuration.type == 'timed'){
				td.textContent = vDuration.duration.amount + ' ' + vDuration.duration.type;
			} else {
            	td.textContent = capitalize(vDuration.type);					
			}
			td.style.textAlign = 'center';


			// Save
            td = tr.insertCell(-1);
			
			if (vSpell['savingThrow']){
				td.textContent = vSpell['savingThrow'][0].substring(0,3);
			}
			td.style.textAlign = 'center';


			// Range
            td = tr.insertCell(-1);
			td.textContent = capitalize(GetRange(vSpell));
			td.style.textAlign = 'right';
			td.setAttribute('data-sort', vSpell.range.inFeet);

			// Source
            td = tr.insertCell(-1);
			td.textContent = vSpell['source'];
			td.style.textAlign = 'center';

			// Learn / Forget button
			if (vIsToken){
           		td = document.createElement('td');
           		td = tr.insertCell(-1);
           		let btn = createLearnButton(vSpell.name);
				
				td.appendChild(btn);
			}


			// Plus sign to expend
            td = tr.insertCell(-1);
            td.className = 'toggle';
			td.textContent= '+';
			td.id = 'Toggle-' + vName;
			
			// Full spell description
			let trDesc = table.insertRow(-1);
			trDesc.style.display = 'none';
			trDesc.id = 'Desc-' + vSpell.name;

            let tdDesc = trDesc.insertCell(-1);
  			let hr = document.createElement('hr'); hr.className = 'divider'; tdDesc.appendChild(hr);

			tdDesc.colSpan = arrHead.length;
			tdDesc.appendChild(GetSpellDesc(vSpell));

			// End of spell description
  			hr = document.createElement('hr'); hr.className = 'divider'; tdDesc.append(hr);			

			td.addEventListener('click', function(){
				if (trDesc.style.display == 'none'){
					trDesc.style.display = 'table-row';
					td.textContent = '-';
				} else {
					trDesc.style.display = 'none';
					td.textContent = '+';
				}
			});


        }


        //ADD THE NEWLY CREATED TABLE TO THE BODY.
        document.body.appendChild(table);

        // Refreshes the table
        filterSpells();

		enableSortSpellTable(table);        
		} catch (err){
			console.log(err);
		}


    }

	//  Add the click listeners to the column names of the main table
   function enableSortSpellTable(table){
		const getCellValue = (tr, idx) => {
			let cell = tr.children[idx];
			return cell.getAttribute('data-sort') || cell.innerText;
		};

		const comparer = (idx, asc) => (a, b) => ((v1, v2) => 
    		v1 !== '' && v2 !== '' && !isNaN(v1) && !isNaN(v2) ? v1 - v2 : v1.toString().localeCompare(v2)
    		)(getCellValue(asc ? a : b, idx), getCellValue(asc ? b : a, idx));

		table.querySelectorAll('th.spellHeader').forEach(th => th.addEventListener('click', (() => {
			try{
    			let tableRows = Array.from(table.rows);
    			tableRows.shift();             // remove header row
    			tableRows = tableRows.filter((element, index) => {  return index % 2 === 0;});
    			tableRows.sort(comparer(Array.from(th.parentNode.children).indexOf(th), this.asc = !this.asc))
        					 .forEach(tr => {   table.appendChild(tr);  table.appendChild(document.getElementById('Desc-' + tr.id));});
			} catch (err){ console.log(err); }
		})));
    }

	// Creates the button to toggle preparation, including the click listeners.
	function createTogglePrepButton(tr, spell){
			td = tr.insertCell(-1);
			let div = document.createElement('div');
			td.appendChild(div);
			td.className = 'unselectable';
			div.className = 'circle';

			if (spell.level == 0){
				div.className += ' always';
				div.setAttribute('data-sort', 'A');
			} else {
				let vIsPrepared = vKnown[spell.name].prepared === 'yes';				
				if (vIsPrepared){
					div.className += ' prepared';
					td.setAttribute('data-sort', 'P');
				} else {
					td.setAttribute('data-sort', 'U');
				}
				
				div.addEventListener('click',  createTogglePrepFunction(spell.name));
			}
	}

	// Creates the function triggered when the user clicks the toggle prep button. This method keeps the context of the function.
    function createTogglePrepFunction(spellName){
		return function(){
			if (this.className.includes('prepared')){
				this.className = this.className.replace(' prepared', '');
				document.getElementById('formEditSpellAction').value = 'unprepare';
				this.closest('td').setAttribute('data-sort', 'U');
			} else {
				this.className = this.className + ' prepared';
				document.getElementById('formEditSpellAction').value = 'prepare';	
				this.closest('td').setAttribute('data-sort', 'P');
			}
						
			document.getElementById('formEditSpellName').value = spellName;	
			document.getElementById('formEditSpell').submit();		
		}
    }

	// Creates the function triggered when the users clicks the toggle learn button. This method keeps the context of the function.
	function createToggleLearnFunction(spellName){
			return function(){
				if (this.className == 'forget'){
					this.textContent = 'Learn';
					this.className   = 'learn';	
					document.getElementById('formEditSpellAction').value = 'forget';	
				} else {
					this.textContent = 'Forget';
					this.className   = 'forget';
					document.getElementById('formEditSpellAction').value = 'learn';
					document.getElementById('formEditSpellStat').value = document.getElementById('DropButton-' + spellName).innerHTML;
				}
				document.getElementById('formEditSpellName').value = spellName;	
				document.getElementById('formEditSpell').submit();
			}
	}

	// Creates the button to learn/forget a spell.
    function createLearnButton(spellName){
		let btn = document.createElement('button');
		if (vKnown.hasOwnProperty(spellName)){
			btn.textContent = 'Forget';
			btn.className   = 'forget';
		} else {
			btn.textContent = 'Learn';
			btn.className   = 'learn';
		}

		btn.addEventListener('click',  createToggleLearnFunction(spellName));
		return btn;
    }

	// Filter to return true if the spell is known.
    function filterKnownSpells(currentSpell){
		return vKnown.hasOwnProperty(currentSpell.name);
    }

	// Filter the spells according to the buttons selected.
	function filterSpells() {
		try {
    	let input, filter, table, i, row, txtValue, rowId, toggle, classes, rowMatch, classMatch, sourceMatch;
    	input = document.getElementById('seachBar');
    	filter = input.value.toUpperCase();
    	filter = filter.replace(QuoteSymbol, '`');
    	table = document.getElementById('spellTable');

    	// Get allowed classes
    	enabledClasses = document.getElementById('classContainer').getElementsByClassName('active');
    	arrayEnabledClasses = new Array();
    	for (m = 0; m < enabledClasses.length; m++){
			arrayEnabledClasses.push(enabledClasses[m].id.replace('selector', ''));
    	}
    	let isAllClassesAllowed = arrayEnabledClasses.includes('All');

		// Get allowed sources
    	enabledSources = document.getElementById('sourceContainer').getElementsByClassName('active');
    	arrayEnabledSources = new Array();
    	for (m = 0; m < enabledSources.length; m++){
			arrayEnabledSources.push(enabledSources[m].id.replace('source', ''));
    	}
    	let isAllSourcesAllowed = arrayEnabledSources.includes('All');

    	// Get allowed levels
    	enabledLevels = document.getElementById('levelContainer').getElementsByClassName('active');
    	arrayEnabledLevels = new Array();
    	for (m = 0; m < enabledLevels.length; m++){
			arrayEnabledLevels.push(enabledLevels[m].id.replace('level', ''));
    	}
    	let isAllLevelsAllowed = arrayEnabledLevels.includes('All');    	

    	for (i = 1; i < table.rows.length; i++) {
        	row = table.rows.item(i);
        	rowId = row.id;
        	rowMatch = false;
        	classMatch = false;
        	sourceMatch = false;
			if (rowId.startsWith('Desc-') == false){
        		if (rowId.toUpperCase().indexOf(filter) > -1) {
					if (isAllClassesAllowed){
						classMatch = true;
					} else {
						let arrayClasses = row.getAttribute('data-classes').split(',');
						if (arrayClasses && arrayClasses.some( item => arrayEnabledClasses.includes(item))){
							classMatch = true;
						}
					}
					if (classMatch){
						if(isAllSourcesAllowed){
							sourceMatch = true;
						} else {
							let source = row.getAttribute('data-source');
							if(arrayEnabledSources.includes(source)){
								sourceMatch = true;
							}
						}
					}
					if (sourceMatch){
						if(isAllLevelsAllowed){
							rowMatch = true;
						} else {
							let level = row.getAttribute('data-level');
							if(arrayEnabledLevels.includes(level)){
								rowMatch = true;
							}
						}
					}
        		}
			}

			if (rowMatch){
            	row.style.display = 'table-row';
            	toggle = document.getElementById('Toggle-' + row.id);            		
            	toggle.textContent = '+';    
			} else {
				row.style.display = 'none';
			}
    	}
		} catch (err){ console.log(err);}
	}
    
</script>
